name: Eliminator SE
features: Eliminator SE JUST RIDE
Eliminator SE
Top Features

ENGINE CHASSIS STYLING INSTRUMENTATION CONNECTIVITY Fuel-Injected 399 cm3 Parallel Twin Engine The Eliminator’s Parallel Twin engine offers strong low-end torque, greatly benefiting low-speed control and manoeuvrability, and contributing to low-stress everyday riding. At highway speeds, its strong power and linear response make its Ninja lineage apparent. Lightweight Trellis Frame Inspired by the Ninja 400’s high-performance trellis frame, the high-tensile steel construction achieves the Eliminator’s long and low design and low seat height while maintaining the active performance potential of its sportier brother. Kawasaki’s advanced dynamic rigidity analysis was used to ensure optimum rigidity with light weight. Long & Low Authentic Motorcycle Styling A long and low design with elegant proportions is created by the vertically thin fuel tank and the horizontal lines evident from the head pipe to the original tail. The design of the impressive, mid-class sized body suggests a balance of active performance and composure. The round headlight and twin-shock rear suspension add to the authentic motorcycle style. All-Digital Instrumentation Compact, round, all-digital LCD instrument panel offers a modern touch that complements the Eliminator’s authentic style. SMARTPHONE CONNECTIVITY Bluetooth technology built into the instrument panel enables riders to connect to their bike wirelessly. Using the smartphone application “RIDEOLOGY THE APP,” a number of instrument functions can be accessed, contributing to an enhanced motorcycling experience. A number of functions are available: - Vehicle Info: information such as fuel gauge, odometer, distance (odometer)-based maintenance reminder, etc can be viewed via the smartphone. - Riding Log: GPS route information as well as vehicle running information can be logged and viewed via the smartphone. - Telephone notices: when a call or mail is received by the smartphone, this is indicated on the instrument display. Tuning – General Settings: general instrument display settings (such as preferred units, time, 12h/24h format, etc) can be adjusted via the smartphone. All-Digital Instrumentation
Compact, round, all-digital LCD instrument panel offers a modern touch that complements the Eliminator’s authentic style.

SMARTPHONE CONNECTIVITY Bluetooth technology built into the instrument panel enables riders to connect to their bike wirelessly. Using the smartphone application “RIDEOLOGY THE APP,” a number of instrument functions can be accessed, contributing to an enhanced motorcycling experience. A number of functions are available: - Vehicle Info: information such as fuel gauge, odometer, distance (odometer)-based maintenance reminder, etc can be viewed via the smartphone. - Riding Log: GPS route information as well as vehicle running information can be logged and viewed via the smartphone. - Telephone notices: when a call or mail is received by the smartphone, this is indicated on the instrument display. Tuning – General Settings: general instrument display settings (such as preferred units, time, 12h/24h format, etc) can be adjusted via the smartphone.
SMARTPHONE CONNECTIVITY

Bluetooth technology built into the instrument panel enables riders to connect to their bike wirelessly. Using the smartphone application “RIDEOLOGY THE APP,” a number of instrument functions can be accessed, contributing to an enhanced motorcycling experience.
A number of functions are available:
- Vehicle Info: information such as fuel gauge, odometer, distance (odometer)-based maintenance reminder, etc can be viewed via the smartphone.
- Riding Log: GPS route information as well as vehicle running information can be logged and viewed via the smartphone.
- Telephone notices: when a call or mail is received by the smartphone, this is indicated on the instrument display.
Tuning – General Settings: general instrument display settings (such as preferred units, time, 12h/24h format, etc) can be adjusted via the smartphone.

Specifications

มิติรถ ความยาว 2,250 mm ความกว้าง 785 mm ความสูง 1,140 mm ระยะฐานล้อ 1,520 mm ระยะห่างจากพื้น 150 mm ความสูงเบาะนั่ง 735 mm น้ำหนักรวม 177 kg น้ำหนัก (ไม่รวมของเหลว) - ความจุถังน้ำมันเชื้อเพลิง 13 litres สมรรถนะ กำลังเครื่องยนต์สูงสุด 35.0 kW {48 PS} / 10,000 min-1 กำลังเครื่องยนต์สูงสุดพร้อมแรมแอร์ - แรงบิดสูงสุด 37.0 N·m {3.8 kgƒ·m} / 8,000 min-1 เครื่องยนต์ ประเภทเครื่องยนต์ 4-stroke Parallel Twin ระบบหล่อเย็น Liquid-cooled ขนาดกระบอกสูบ x ช่วงชัก 70.0 x 51.8 mm ปริมาตรกระบอกสูบ 399 CC อัตราส่วนกำลังอัด 11.5:1 ระบบจ่ายเชื้อเพลิง Fuel injection: ø32 mm x 2 ระบบหล่อลื่น Forced lubrication, wet sump ระบบสตาร์ท EL. Starter ระบบจุดระเบิด Digital ระบบขับเคลื่อน ระบบขับเคลื่อน Chain ระบบส่งกำลัง 6-speed, return อัตราทดขั้นต้น 1.037 (28/27) อัตราทดเกียร์ 1 2.929 (41/14) อัตราทดเกียร์ 2 2.056 (37/18) อัตราทดเกียร์ 3 1.619 (34/21) อัตราทดเกียร์ 4 1.333 (32/24) อัตราทดเกียร์ 5 1.154 (30/26) อัตราทดเกียร์ 6 1.037 (28/27) อัตราทดสุดท้าย 3.017 (43/14) ประเภทคลัตช์ (หลัก) Wet multi-disc, manual ตัวถัง ประเภทเฟรม Trellis, high-tensile steel ระบบกันสะเทือนหน้า Ø41 mm telescopic fork ระบบกันสะเทือนหลัง Twin shocks ระยะยุบล้อหน้า 120 mm ระยะยุบล้อหลัง 90 mm มุมแคสเตอร์ 30° ระยะเทรล 121 mm มุมเลี้ยว (ซ้าย/ขวา) 35° / 35° ยางหน้า 130/70-18M/C 63H ยางหลัง 150/80-16M/C 71H เบรกหน้า Ø310 mm disc คาลิปเปอร์ (หน้า) Dual-piston เบรกหลัง Ø240 mm disc คาลิปเปอร์ (หลัง) Dual-piston

name: Eliminator
features: Eliminator JUST RIDE
Top Features

ENGINE CHASSIS STYLING INSTRUMENTATION CONNECTIVITY Fuel-Injected 399 cm3 Parallel Twin Engine The Eliminator’s Parallel Twin engine offers strong low-end torque, greatly benefiting low-speed control and manoeuvrability, and contributing to low-stress everyday riding. At highway speeds, its strong power and linear response make its Ninja lineage apparent. Lightweight Trellis Frame Inspired by the Ninja 400’s high-performance trellis frame, the high-tensile steel construction achieves the Eliminator’s long and low design and low seat height while maintaining the active performance potential of its sportier brother. Kawasaki’s advanced dynamic rigidity analysis was used to ensure optimum rigidity with light weight. Long & Low Authentic Motorcycle Styling A long and low design with elegant proportions is created by the vertically thin fuel tank and the horizontal lines evident from the head pipe to the original tail. The design of the impressive, mid-class sized body suggests a balance of active performance and composure. The round headlight and twin-shock rear suspension add to the authentic motorcycle style. All-Digital Instrumentation Compact, round, all-digital LCD instrument panel offers a modern touch that complements the Eliminator’s authentic style. SMARTPHONE CONNECTIVITY Bluetooth technology built into the instrument panel enables riders to connect to their bike wirelessly. Using the smartphone application “RIDEOLOGY THE APP,” a number of instrument functions can be accessed, contributing to an enhanced motorcycling experience. A number of functions are available: - Vehicle Info: information such as fuel gauge, odometer, distance (odometer)-based maintenance reminder, etc can be viewed via the smartphone. - Riding Log: GPS route information as well as vehicle running information can be logged and viewed via the smartphone. - Telephone notices: when a call or mail is received by the smartphone, this is indicated on the instrument display. Tuning – General Settings: general instrument display settings (such as preferred units, time, 12h/24h format, etc) can be adjusted via the smartphone. A number of functions are available: - Vehicle Info: information such as fuel gauge, odometer, distance (odometer)-based maintenance reminder, etc can be viewed via the smartphone. - Riding Log: GPS route information as well as vehicle running information can be logged and viewed via the smartphone. - Telephone notices: when a call or mail is received by the smartphone, this is indicated on the instrument display. Tuning – General Settings: general instrument display settings (such as preferred units, time, 12h/24h format, etc) can be adjusted via the smartphone.
SMARTPHONE CONNECTIVITY

Bluetooth technology built into the instrument panel enables riders to connect to their bike wirelessly. Using the smartphone application “RIDEOLOGY THE APP,” a number of instrument functions can be accessed, contributing to an enhanced motorcycling experience.
A number of functions are available:
- Vehicle Info: information such as fuel gauge, odometer, distance (odometer)-based maintenance reminder, etc can be viewed via the smartphone.
- Riding Log: GPS route information as well as vehicle running information can be logged and viewed via the smartphone.
- Telephone notices: when a call or mail is received by the smartphone, this is indicated on the instrument display.
Tuning – General Settings: general instrument display settings (such as preferred units, time, 12h/24h format, etc) can be adjusted via the smartphone.

Fuel-Injected 399 cm3 Parallel Twin Engine The Eliminator’s Parallel Twin engine offers strong low-end torque, greatly benefiting low-speed control and manoeuvrability, and contributing to low-stress everyday riding. At highway speeds, its strong power and linear response make its Ninja lineage apparent. Lightweight Trellis Frame Inspired by the Ninja 400’s high-performance trellis frame, the high-tensile steel construction achieves the Eliminator’s long and low design and low seat height while maintaining the active performance potential of its sportier brother. Kawasaki’s advanced dynamic rigidity analysis was used to ensure optimum rigidity with light weight. Long & Low Authentic Motorcycle Styling A long and low design with elegant proportions is created by the vertically thin fuel tank and the horizontal lines evident from the head pipe to the original tail. The design of the impressive, mid-class sized body suggests a balance of active performance and composure. The round headlight and twin-shock rear suspension add to the authentic motorcycle style. All-Digital Instrumentation Compact, round, all-digital LCD instrument panel offers a modern touch that complements the Eliminator’s authentic style. Using the smartphone application “RIDEOLOGY THE APP,” a number of instrument functions can be accessed, contributing to an enhanced motorcycling experience. A number of functions are available: - Vehicle Info: information such as fuel gauge, odometer, distance (odometer)-based maintenance reminder, etc can be viewed via the smartphone. - Riding Log: GPS route information as well as vehicle running information can be logged and viewed via the smartphone. - Telephone notices: when a call or mail is received by the smartphone, this is indicated on the instrument display. มิติรถ ความยาว 2,250 mm ความกว้าง 785 mm ความสูง 1,100 mm ระยะฐานล้อ 1,520 mm ระยะห่างจากพื้น 150 mm ความสูงเบาะนั่ง 735 mm น้ำหนักรวม 176 kg น้ำหนัก (ไม่รวมของเหลว) - ความจุถังน้ำมันเชื้อเพลิง 13 litres สมรรถนะ กำลังเครื่องยนต์สูงสุด 35.0 kW {48 PS} / 10,000 min-1 กำลังเครื่องยนต์สูงสุดพร้อมแรมแอร์ - แรงบิดสูงสุด 37.0 N·m {3.8 kgƒ·m} / 8,000 min-1 เครื่องยนต์ ประเภทเครื่องยนต์ 4-stroke Parallel Twin ระบบหล่อเย็น Liquid-cooled ขนาดกระบอกสูบ x ช่วงชัก 70.0 x 51.8 mm ปริมาตรกระบอกสูบ 399 CC อัตราส่วนกำลังอัด 11.5:1 ระบบจ่ายเชื้อเพลิง Fuel injection: ø32 mm x 2 ระบบหล่อลื่น Forced lubrication, wet sump ระบบสตาร์ท EL.
